p: J774.1 cells were plated (5 × 10 4 cells/well) and treated as described above for 24 h. Nitrite levels in the culture supernatants were determined using the colorimetric Griess reaction (Sigma, St. Louis, MO, U.S.A.). Absorbance was measured with a plate reader at 550 nm. The concentration of nitrite (NO 2 −) was determined from standard curves constructed with serial concentrations of sodium nitrite (NaNO 2).
